title: Marvel MMO From DC Universe Online Developer!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.29.21
description:
Blessing and Tim are back from break with a lot of news to discuss! Let's talk about a new Marvel MMO, Xbox Series S sales, Geoff Keighley teasing Game Awards announcements, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
About an hour after this KFGD ends, we’re recording PS I Love You XOXO live on Patreon. It’s our PlayStation Now 2021 Review. Write in with your questions or thoughts about PlayStation Now to Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames for Janet and me to talk about on the show.
Our Hawkeye episodes 1 and 2 review is up on Youtube featuring Tim, Nick, and Kevin breaking down all their thoughts and feelings on the new Marvel show. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunny.
Tomorrow’s Giving Tuesday, and we’re raising money for Project HOPE! What are we streaming? Well, Greg Miller’s coming back to stream Marvel’s Avengers with SnowBikeMike and see how Spider-Man plays on opening day! Check it out tomorrow after KFGD over on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:50 - A new Marvel MMO is INCOMING - Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer
00:15:30 - One Game Awards reveal ‘has been in the works for 2.5 years’ - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:24:40 - The Xbox Series S was Black Friday’s best selling console - Zack Zweizen @ Kotaku
00:31:27 -  Ad
00:36:30 - Cyberpunk 2077 is getting a recent boost - Andy Robinson @ Robinson
00:43:27 - Half-Life 3 is reportedly not in development, as ‘Valve focuses on Steam Deck’ - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:47:50 - Amazon Wants To Make A Mass Effect TV Series - Luke plunkett @ Kotaku
00:54:50 - Out today
00:55:25 - Squad Up: Zombiehighx23
00:55:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim and Gary

Blessing and Tim are back from break with a lot of news to discuss! Let's talk about a new Marvel MMO, Xbox Series S sales, Geoff Keighley teasing Game Awards announcements, and more!


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:04:00 - Housekeeping

About an hour after this KFGD ends, we’re recording PS I Love You XOXO live on Patreon. It’s our PlayStation Now 2021 Review. Write in with your questions or thoughts about PlayStation Now to Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames for Janet and me to talk about on the show.

Our Hawkeye episodes 1 and 2 review is up on Youtube featuring Tim, Nick, and Kevin breaking down all their thoughts and feelings on the new Marvel show. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunny.

Tomorrow’s Giving Tuesday, and we’re raising money for Project HOPE! What are we streaming? Well, Greg Miller’s coming back to stream Marvel’s Avengers with SnowBikeMike and see how Spider-Man plays on opening day! Check it out tomorrow after KFGD over on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
